posts.post_content:
Looking for the following T206's:  SGC or PSA and grade must be better than 2.5 thru 4ish.  Will consider raw from trusted sellers.  Will pay fair market value.  Thanks Guys!

Johnny Evers

Rube Waddell  

Eddie Collins 

Mordecai Brown 

Joe Tinker
